text: Takheun leh siat jinoe lon peugah Lon peugah teuma jinoe bak gata Peue jeuneh atra nyang leubeh mewah Keuneubah Tuhan keu soe nyang takwa Lampoh churuga leubeh that indah Ile ngon ie krueng di yup churuga Ngon keukai baka seunang sileupah Ngon judo-judo nyang mantong suci Ridha Ilahi nyang peunteng leupah Tuhan Neukalon bandumna hamba
